Table of Contents

  2. CXX=g++
  3. CC_LD=cc
  4. CXX_LD=g++

  6. ARFLAGS=rcu
  7. PLATFORM=OS_LINUX
  8. PLATFORM_LDFLAGS=-lpthread -Wl,-E -ldl
  9. PLATFORM_LIBS=-ldl -lm
  10. PLATFORM_CCFLAGS= -O2 -pthread -DOS_LINUX -fPIC -fno-builtin-memcmp
  11. PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS= -O2 -pthread -DOS_LINUX -fPIC -fno-builtin-memcmp
  12. PLATFORM_SHARED_CFLAGS=-fPIC
  13. PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT=so
  14. PLATFORM_STATIC_EXT=a
  15. PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS=-shared -Wl,-soname -Wl,
  16. PLATFORM_SHARED_VERSIONED=true
  17. ECHO_OPT=-e
